title: DevOps Moves Beyond Automation to Tackle New Challenges
author: Eric Newcomer
description: As basic DevOps adoption becomes widespread, organizations are shifting focus to new frontiers including security integration, resilience, and organizational transformation.
cntitle: DevOps 迈向自动化之外，应对新挑战
cndescription: 随着基础 DevOps 采用的普及，组织正在将重点转移到新的领域，包括安全集成、弹性和组织转型。
